title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, April 12, 2022
description: It's the 70th birthday of author Gary Soto. His most recent work is a collection of poetry “Meatballs for the People: Proverbs to Chew On” published in 2017.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the 70th birthday of author Gary Soto. His most recent work is a collection of poetry “Meatballs for the People: Proverbs to Chew On” published in 2017.
